description:

comments.content: Is this reproducible?  Is there anything that helps point to whether this was a nova bug, or a problem with the instance the tests were being run on?

comments.content: Not sure,  but the issue hasn't been seen since the 2013-02-19 (http://status.openstack.org/rechecks/)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
